data.name: Red Hulk
data.description: A gamma-charged Thaddeus "Thunderbolt" Ross, Red Hulk is a legendary Brawler who applies Trauma and destroys enemies with devastating blows.

starItems.name: Red Hulk
starItems.description: A gamma-charged Thaddeus "Thunderbolt" Ross, Red Hulk is a legendary Brawler who applies Trauma and destroys enemies with devastating blows.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist and has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, that Counterattack or Assist gains <color=#86e619>+100%</color> Damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary target
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect on the primary target

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist and has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, that Counterattack or Assist gains <color=#86e619>+100%</color> Damage and flips <color=#86e619>1</color> additional positive effect to a negative effect.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional times instead.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional times instead.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional times instead.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional times instead.
4.nextUpgrade:
Clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> on the primary target + this clear cannot be resisted
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

5.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> on the primary target. This clear cannot be resisted.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional times instead.
5.nextUpgrade:
Clear Barrier on primary and adjacent targets
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

6.description:
Clear Barrier on primary and adjacent targets.
Clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> on the primary target. This clear cannot be resisted.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional times instead.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> on primary and adjacent targets

7.description:
Clear Barrier on primary and adjacent targets.
Clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> on the primary target. This clear cannot be resisted.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, and reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional times instead.
7.nextUpgrade:
If Apocalypse is an ally, or with <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> on adjacent targets
Fill Speed Bar for <color=#86e619>1</color> random, adjacent <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> ally by <color=#86e619>10%</color>
Fill Speed Bar for <color=#86e619>1</color> random Apocalypse ally by <color=#86e619>15%</color>

item.name: Red Hulk's Special Awakened Ability Material
item.description: Used to further upgrade character abilities.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

8.description:
Clear Barrier on primary and adjacent targets.
Clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> on the primary target. If Apocalypse is an ally, or with <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> on adjacent targets as well. This clear cannot be resisted.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, and reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional times instead.

Fill Speed Bar for <color=#86e619>1</color> random, adjacent <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> ally by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
Fill Speed Bar for <color=#86e619>1</color> random Apocalypse ally by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect.

Gain <color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be blocked or dodged.

<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to clear all Battlefield Effects on the enemy side and apply the Battlefield Effect, <color=#D81B1B>Gamma Radiation</color>, to the enemy side.

<color=#D81B1B>Gamma Radiation</color>:
 > On enemy Turn, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing damage + apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
 > Attacks from this Battlefield Effect are unavoidable.
 > This Battlefield Effect lasts until cleared or until the end of the match.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to clear all Battlefield Effects on the enemy side and apply <color=#D81B1B>Gamma Radiation</color>

1.description:
On Spawn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On Turn, Heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When an enemy attacks this character, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed, +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Block Chance, and +<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to Counterattack.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies, when an enemy attacks this character, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage Reduction. <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage Reduction.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance.
 > <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Minor Defense Up</color> cannot be applied to self or any <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade: At the end of any turn, when this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain <color=#86e619>7</color> ability energy. This can only trigger once per match and only once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>

2.description:
On Spawn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On Turn, Heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
At the end of any turn, when this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain <color=#86e619>7</color> ability energy. This can only trigger once per match and only once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>.

When an enemy attacks this character, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed, +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Block Chance, and +<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to Counterattack.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies, when an enemy attacks this character, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage Reduction. <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage Reduction.

 > <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Minor Defense Up</color> cannot be applied to self or any <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Healing
On Spawn, if Hulk is an ally, gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus for self and all <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies

On Spawn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On Spawn, if Hulk is an ally, gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> ally

4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Healing
At the end of any turn, when this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color>. This can only trigger once per match and only once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>

5.description:
On Spawn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On Spawn, if Hulk is an ally, gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.

On Turn, Heal self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
At the end of any turn, when this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain <color=#86e619>7</color> ability energy and fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color>. This can only trigger once per match and only once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>.

When an enemy attacks this character, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Focus.
For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed, +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Block Chance, and +<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to Counterattack.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> ally.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies, when an enemy attacks this character, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage Reduction. <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage Reduction.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance.
 > <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Minor Defense Up</color> cannot be applied to self or any <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies.
5.nextUpgrade:
At the end of this character's turn, if Apocalypse is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>
Apocalypse and all <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Focus.

item.name: Red Hulk's Passive Awakened Ability Material
item.description: Used to further upgrade character abilities.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:

 > When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
